system.description: Depending on the version you choose, you can raise or lower the water level in a body of water, part water to create a trench, make water flow in a direction you choose, or form a whirlpool. You can affect a volume of water 10 feet square and 10 feet deep per level. In flowing water (river, stream), the duration is reduced. You cannot control water in creatures' bodies.

components.materialDescription: A drop of water and a pinch of dust (cleric); a pinch of dung and a drop of water (druid).

system.target: Water in a volume of 10 ft./level by 10 ft./level by 2 ft./level
